title: Fak leh dil hun lawmawmah hian
lyrics:
Fak leh dil hun lawmawmah hian,
Amah i fak ang u;
Rinnain kan hmu zel ang a,
Kan lawmna a chho vang.
Chakna thar chu kan hmu ang a,
Chu thutiam ropui chu;
Leiah thiante then mah ila,
Vanah kan intawk ang.

Hmangaihna a va lawmawm em,
Kan thinlung lawmna chu;
Krista, Pathian Fapa hming mawi,
A hminga kan inkhawm.
Inthenna lo thleng mah sela,
A thutiam avang chuan,
Beiseinain nakinah chuan,
Vanah kan intawk ang.

Tin, leia kan lo hah hunin,
Lui ral mawi kan thleng ang;
Kumkhuaa kan nghah reng hmun chu,
Chu ram eng mawi tak chu.
Nakinah thlipui leh thlemna
A lo ral vek hunin;
Chatuan hla saa lawm chungin,
Vanah kan intawk ang.
